GET /accounts/{account_id}/magic/advance.description: List all DNS Protection rules for an account.

parameters.description: The ID of the account.
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The number of items per page. Must be between 10 and 1000. Defaults to 25.
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: The field to order by. Defaults to 'prefix'.
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: The direction of ordering (ASC or DESC). Defaults to 'ASC'.
parameters.name: direction

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service.

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results.

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results.

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters.

burst_sensitivity.description: The burst sensitivity. Must be one of 'low', 'medium', 'high'.

created_on.description: The creation timestamp of the DNS Protection rule.

id.description: The unique ID of the DNS Protection rule.

mode.description: The mode for DNS Protection. Must be one of 'enabled', 'disabled', 'monitoring'.

modified_on.description: The last modification timestamp of the DNS Protection rule.

name.description: The name of the DNS Protection rule. Value is relative to the 'scope' setting. For 'global' scope, name should be 'global'. For either the 'region' or 'datacenter' scope, name should be the actual name of the region or datacenter, e.g., 'wnam' or 'lax'.

profile_sensitivity.description: The profile sensitivity. Recommended setting is 'low'. Must be one of 'low', 'medium', 'high', or 'very_high'.

rate_sensitivity.description: The rate sensitivity. Must be one of 'low', 'medium', 'high'.

scope.description: The scope for the DNS Protection rule. Must be one of 'global', 'region', or 'datacenter'.

200.description: List all DNS Protection rules response.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

4XX.description: List all DNS Protection rules failure.
